notes: This dataset contains information on Dwelling occupants owning the dwelling they live in and are using piped water. The dataset was collected for the Maji-data project.  MajiData is the pro-poor database covering all the urban low income areas of Kenya which has been prepared by the Ministry of Water and Irrigation (MWI) and the Water Services Trust Fund (WSTF) in cooperation with UN-Habitat, the German Development Bank (KfW), Google org. and GIZ.
